### Open Construction Source List for CFB Wainwright Solicitation

#### Solicitation Overview

The Department of National Defence, through Defence Construction Canada (DCC), invites contractors and suppliers to apply to be placed on an Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work required at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Wainwright. The OCSL will be used for three fiscal years, from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2026.

#### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible, contractors and suppliers must submit a request through the MERX posting and indicate their preferred official language (English or French). The language selected by the applicant will be used for all future tenders and during the execution of any resulting contract.

#### Tender Description

The OCSL will be used for construction services with an estimated value of $10 million and below. As opportunities arise, DCC will invite all contractors and suppliers on the OCSL to bid on the work. Tenders will close electronically through MERX, and contractors and suppliers will be required to have an active MERX account to submit electronic bids.

#### Exclusion from the OCSL

DCC reserves the right to exclude contractors and suppliers from the OCSL for various reasons, including:

* Continuing to use existing source lists for similar or related services
* Establishing other source lists for specific categories of construction services
* Verifying contractor interest and removing inactive contractors
* Requiring additional pre-qualification requirements for specific tenders
* Posting tenders openly on MERX
* Setting aside opportunities for Indigenous businesses
* Including a requirement for subcontracting to Indigenous businesses

#### Security Requirements

Contracts awarded by DCC may include measurable performance standards and requirements. Contractors and suppliers must meet the security requirements outlined in the solicitation and must maintain the required security clearances throughout the contract period.

#### Contact Information

For more information on this solicitation, please contact Justin Bennett at Defence Construction Canada:

* Phone: 819-962-2917
* Email: [Justin.Bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Justin.Bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Address: Defence Construction Canada, Calgary
